awardEventDetails.title: 2015 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.for: TV Program of the Year
awardEventDetails.description: (THE KNICK sparks an electric sense for the future in what first appears to be a bloody and backward past at New York's Knickerbocker Hospital. Creators Jack Amiel and Michael Begler - along with the symphonic talents of director, cinematographer and editor Steven Soderbergh - operate in a world where ambition and addiction, issues of race and reputation all collide in the masterful personification of Dr. John Thackery by Clive Owen.)

awardEventDetails.title: 2015 Nominee VES Award
awardEventDetails.for: Outstanding Compositing in a Photoreal/Live Action Broadcast Program
awardEventDetails.description: Vance Miller - Aaron Raff - John Bair - Rebecca Dunn (Abigail's Nose)

awardEventDetails.title: 2015 Winner TV Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Voice Actor in a TV Series
awardEventDetails.description: Fabio Boccanera (For the dubbing of Clive Owen.)

awardEventDetails.title: 2014 Nominee HMMA Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Original Score - TV Show/Digital Streaming Series

awardEventDetails.title: 2014 Nominee IGN Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best TV Actor
